articles.author: Feroz Khan
articles.title: If India Want Asia Cup Games at Neutral Venue, Will Withdraw from ODI World Cup: Pakistan Sports Minister - News18
articles.description: The Asia Cup 2023 is scheduled to get underway from August 31st and will be jointly hosted by Pakistan and Sri Lanka
articles.content: Pakistan sports minister Ehsaan Mazari has warned they will pull out from the ICC ODI World Cup 2023 should Indian team not travel his country for the Asia Cup slated to get underway from August 31.… [+2590 chars]
